description:
Gao struggles to understand Gaito`s attitude towards Buddyfight. In their semi-final match, Gao and Gaito pit their Impact Monsters against each other. Can Gao befriend this fearsome opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Not Working! Bal Burst Smasher?!
ダメダァ! バルバースト・スマッシャー!?
